enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Tailored solutions for large organizations with specific needs.

questions.question: What's included in the free trial?
questions.answer: Our free trial gives you access to most Professional plan features for 14 days, including a limited number of company searches and data extractions. No credit card required.

questions.question: Can I change my plan later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be prorated for the current billing cycle.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and PayPal. For Enterprise plans, we also support invoicing and bank transfers.

questions.question: Is there a discount for annual billing?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a discount equivalent to two months free if you choose to pay annually for the Starter or Professional plans.

questions.question: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
questions.answer: You will be notified before exceeding your limits. You can choose to upgrade your plan or purchase add-on packs for additional searches or extractions for the current month.

questions.question: Do you offer support for all plans?
questions.answer: All plans include email support. Professional plans receive priority email support, and Enterprise plans have a dedicated account manager and phone support options.

cta.title: Still Have Questions? We're Here to Help.
cta.description: Our team is ready to assist you in choosing the best plan or creating a custom solution for your unique business needs.
